Entry.Body:
*** NEW !!! ***
We noticed your Voice Pack is out of date. A new version is now available.
Go to the AddOn menu and select Manage Add-Ons to update your pack.
Note: By installing this new version any changes you made to the previous pack, such as turning off events, will be lost.

*** NEW !!! ***
We noticed your Voice Pack is out of date. A new version is now available.
Go to the AddOn menu and select Manage Add-Ons to update your pack.
Note: By installing this new version any changes you made to the previous pack, such as turning off events, will be lost.

*** NEU !!! ***
Wir haben bemerkt, dass deine Version des Voice Packs veraltet ist.
Öffne das AddOn-Menü und benutze den AddOn-Manager um dein Voice Pack zu aktualisieren.
Beachte: Beim Updaten des Voice Packs gehen sämtliche vorgenommenen VP-Einstellungen, wie etwa deaktivierte Ereignisse, verloren.

*** NEW !!! ***
We noticed your Voice Pack is out of date. A new version is now available.
Go to the AddOn menu and select Manage Add-Ons to update your pack.
Note: By installing this new version any changes you made to the previous pack, such as turning off events, will be lost.

*** NUEVO !!! ***
Hemos notado que tu versión del Paquete de Voz está desactualizada. Una nueva versión se encuentra disponible.
Ve al menú de Complementos y selecciona Administrar Complementos para actualizar tu paquete.
Nota: Al instalar esta nueva versión, cualquier cambio que hayas hecho en el paquete anterior, como desactivar eventos, se perderá.

Body.Caption: EDD Canonn Panel Out Of Date

Entry.Body:
*** NEW !!! ***
We noticed your EDD Canonn panel is out of date. A new version is now available.
Go to the AddOn menu and select Manage Add-Ons to update your pack.
